alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:23PM CDT until August 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN MCHENRY COUNTY... At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Deering, or 20 miles northeast of Minot, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Denbigh around 435 PM CDT. Towner around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bantry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
